stories.title: Clean Development Task Interface
stories.description: Simplify the Development Task interface by removing unnecessary branch management complexity to provide a clean and focused task management experience.
stories.i_want: to remove Branch, PR created, and Rebase links from the Development Task interface
stories.so_that: I can have a simple and clean task management interface without unnecessary branch management complexity

stories.title: Remove View Conversation Link
stories.description: Remove the 'View conversation' link from Development Task cards to reduce UI clutter
stories.so_that: I have fewer distracting elements in the task interface

stories.title: Remove Latest Update Link
stories.description: Remove the 'View latest update' link from Development Task cards
stories.i_want: the View latest update link removed
stories.so_that: the interface is cleaner and more focused

stories.title: Remove Rebase Button
stories.description: Remove the 'Rebase' button from Development Task cards and associated functionality
stories.i_want: the Rebase button and functionality removed
stories.so_that: I'm not distracted by branch management operations

acceptanceTests.title: Development Task interface is clean
acceptanceTests.given: I am viewing a Development Task card
acceptanceTests.when_step: I look at the available actions
acceptanceTests.then_step: I should not see Branch, PR created, or Rebase links

acceptanceTests.title: View conversation link is removed
acceptanceTests.given: I am viewing a Development Task card
acceptanceTests.when_step: I look for the View conversation link
acceptanceTests.then_step: The link should not be present
